response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which is tailored to meet your unique needs and valued at $1,000,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and the significant impact it can have on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate with you.", "product_price": 950000}
